summary: Project with an admin dashboard and compliance features. Admin access is restricted to finproledge@gmail.com.
architectural_notes: Admin access is restricted to finproledge@gmail.com only

existing_features.title: Update the AdminGuard component to allow admin access exclusively to the email address finproledge@gmail.com. Any authenticated user whose profile email does not exactly match finproledge@gmail.com must be shown an 'Access Denied' state and prevented from viewing any admin-only pages or content.

new_feature_requests.summary: Restrict admin access to only the email finproledge@gmail.com

Ensure the backend isCallerAdmin authorization logic recognizes only the principal associated with the Internet Identity linked to finproledge@gmail.com as an admin. All admin-gated backend methods must reject calls from any other principal.
